website_summaries.verdict: Most owners find them sharp and suitable for their needs, and the price is lower than that of some other choices.
pros: The blades are sharp and the scissors feel balanced in the hand
Pretty chrome aesthetic would make them a nice addition to a sewing box
cons: some buyers said they found the blade to be too dull

customer_reviews.title: Just like your Grandma's scissors!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these scissors. Bought them to replace expensive fabric scissors and I wish I'd done it a long time ago. These are heavy, but comfortably to use- no obnoxiously protruding angles like some of the metal-handled scissors I've tried. Sharp right out of the box, tested on a fine lawn that tends to get trapped between the tips of other shears. They are bigger than I expected, despite the manufacturer photos- I may add a couple of snaps to this review- definitely not for travelling. These are like the scissors your grandmother had- with any luck my sons will produce some grandkids for me so I have someone to pass them on to!
customer_reviews.author: BetsyB

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight. Not to long and not to short. Seems like they would hold up for awhile if they weren't such poor craftsmenship. When I got them out of the package to start using them, they were to dull towards the end of the blades and i ruined my fabric. I was expecting to be able to use them right out of the box and not have to go get them sharpened. It's a little upsetting when you ruin perfectly good fabric with a pair of brand new dull scissors. Also, they loosen after every use so im constantly tightening the screw on the side. That is a little inconvenient. Unpleased customer!!! Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanna

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty, but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors feel heavy, but they sure are comfortable. I compared them to regular (decent) scissors using an old shirt and old jeans. The regular scissors did cut, but could only use the first 25% of the blade (closest to the hinge) before it began to bind up. These scissors cut like butter for the entire length of the blade. Of course, the real test of scissors is the test of time. I can't speak, yet, for how well they hold an edge.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: These are some high-quality scissors. The packaging itself makes me think I ordered something that will never break. I've had mine cut through all kinds of fabric without issues. They are also useful to have in the house in the event of a home-invasion... not that I've ever had to use them for that.
customer_reviews.author: QuincyJ

customer_reviews.title: My favorite big scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite scissors on the whole planet. They are awesome for cutting fabric. I use them with my Girl Scouts to make no sew fleece blankets, and they are great. I do not recommend them for kids or for cutting anything small/precise. But if you have a big fat piece of fabric to cut, these are great. And they're a good price. Much better than the fancy Fiskars scissors I bought for 6 times the price (per scissor) at JoAnn Fabrics. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Very Easy to Cut Marine Materials
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty scissor, I am using this to cut .40 plastic windows for marine use. The heavy duty scissor makes it easy to cut thru the heavy material. I noticed they do need to be sharpened a bit. Overall very good quality, these scissors will last a lifetime of use. I have cut marine canvas and very heavy duty window material with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: These are the largest and heaviest fabric scissors I own ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the largest and heaviest fabric scissors I own. These are high-quality scissors that I make sure that no one uses the scissors for anything else other than fabric. The only downside for me is that my hands are really small so trying to cut a large amount of fabric with these others can be difficult but they're also very sharp and they cut very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmi Katikala

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The are an absolutely beautiful pair of shears with a nice and sturdy weight, however when I attempted to cut through 2 layers of fleece, there seemed to be quite a bit of struggle. They were able to cut through thinner fabrics without difficulty. I purchased a different pair from amazon, same price range and comparable to the design, size and weight of these shears but the results were much better. Based on the other reviews, perhaps the pair I received were faulty. I wanted to love them, however I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Thelchar

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: These cut well but they are very rough inside the finger holes. It makes them uncomfortable to use. The problem is that they don’t seem to do anything to smooth out the mold lines and they run inside the finger holes. This causes them to feel rough,sharp and irritating to your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Troy E

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy I got these. They are so worth the price. I cut through 24 layers of fabric plus 2 of Insulbright plus 2 of cotton batting all at once with these (oven mitt and loop handle plus bias). They are really big, but the get the job done, and the price is great for them. I highly recommend these to any hardcore seamstress.
customer_reviews.author: RebelScumHan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: These scissors have great weight and balance and are clean and modern looking. I used them to trim a thick carpet pad and they did the job well. They almost seemed to good to sue for such a rough job!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge, precise, and does what it needs to:  Cuts stuf
customer_reviews.text: Huge, precise, and does what it needs to: Cuts stuff. The handles are very shaped, and may be better suited for slightly smaller hands than mine (a man), but it is not that big a problem. Not a bit of plastic on it--all metal, all steel. Probably will last to the end of time.
customer_reviews.author: jtflag

customer_reviews.title: Really nice scissors
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are really, really nice. I was so impressed with them, especially at the price, that I bought a second pair as a backup (haven't needed the backup yet, they are still unopened in a drawer). I have been using them to cut heavy upholstery fabric and they are every bit as sharp today as the day I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Awesage

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: Works great very inexpensive. Great feel. Very sharp. I just buy a new pair when I trim my giant breed dogs. Cheaper than 150.00 groomer plus tip per dog.
customer_reviews.author: BRT dog ownedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love Equinox products honestly
customer_reviews.text: I love Equinox products honestly! This is my third pair of scissors, my other two are for hair. They are affordable, heavy duty, sharp, and pretty, if that’s possible. I’ll continue to buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: TOO HEAVY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These weigh a ton. I kept them because my husband uses them in the garage. They work great for heavy canvas and vinyl. Not meant to use on delicate fabric or for small hands and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality and large, sturdy scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great quality. I have small hands but I love them. They have cut many things with ease.
customer_reviews.author: KRNRNNP

customer_reviews.title: I've broken a million scissor handles, HAH! I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've broken a million scissor handles, HAH! I don't know my own strength. These are on point. and will probably never die unless I lose them.....
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great; feel great in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far.Worked great; feel great in your hand. Good qua;ity! Mom was a home ec teacher. She would love these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality and they cut fabric really well
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality and they cut fabric really well. They are a little bit big for my preference but other than I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: OhNoMrBill

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cutting fabric. I have only used it on satin fabric so far so I cannot grade how it will do with heavier fabric. Easy to handle, does not hurt hands. Just finished cutting 80 yard of fabric into 24 pieces and it made my job much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisisme

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp! I use these to cut fleece fabric, which is insufferably frustrating to do with dull scissors. But with these I whiz right through the fabric. My only con is they're heavy so my hand gets tired after using them for awhile and I have to take breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Glides through fabric
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scissors for fabric. Glides like butter through any type of fabric. I keep these scissors in my sewing cabinet so that no one uses them for anything else. Super sharp exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Sara Squan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG....I love love this shears! They are two tone and extra chic. They cut like true tailor scissors. I'm a daughter of a tailor...I know. Is the most professional shears our there for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional scissors. They are heavy and very good quality. They cut fabric like slicing through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: and have good weight.
customer_reviews.text: Not a seamstress, just needed them to do a small project. They are very sharp, and have good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for my girlfriend, great quality, weight and ergonomics. Can't ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Jesus M. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Notch in the blades like someone cut a wire.
customer_reviews.text: These have a notch in the blades, and had to be tightened to cut effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: These are really more like shears that can be used like scissors. Incredibly strong, will cut through virtually all difficult cutable materials. Solid metal construction so that handles never break under cutting pressure. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Iaconelli

customer_reviews.title: damn sharp!
customer_reviews.text: these scissors are the bomb. they definitely cut through carpet, and with precision.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: stays sharp, good construction
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy as hell, but it does cut nicely from tip to screw. I tend to use the tip a lot. It is really good.
customer_reviews.author: 808mama

customer_reviews.title: She thinks they are really good quality in general and not just for the price
customer_reviews.text: Moms an experienced seemstress. She thinks they are really good quality in general and not just for the price. The price is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: When I got my scissors I was very pleased came on time
customer_reviews.text: When I got my scissors I was very pleased came on time, very good weight and sharpness, it is a good buy i am in Fabric stores and believe me you would not get this price N VJames
customer_reviews.author: Noelyn V James

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. A great price and so sharp and long. Perfect for my business and person use for cutting fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Contra

customer_reviews.title: Finally: fine, lovely, substantial scissors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8" Culina set, but I returned them: insubstantial. These Equinox are excellent, beautiful, large scissors; I may order a pair for each story.
customer_reviews.author: El Evaluator

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not well weighted. Bases sometimes close with a gap leaving an off target cut or no cut
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through fabric like softened butter
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through fabric like softened butter! Great item, super fast delivery - can't recommend this item and the seller enough!
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors! Fit perfect in your hands nice and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love this :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of sewing shears. Heavy, quality item and if a great addition to your kit if you sew.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of getting another pair for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new scissors. I like how study they are and the grip is comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Schaffner98568

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of scissors for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are sharp, and a bit heavy. Cuts any fabric/paper with no wear in sharpness. What else is required from a pair of scissors ?
customer_reviews.author: SuperZak

customer_reviews.title: but I like what I see
customer_reviews.text: Have used it yet, but I like what I see.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Best Scissors I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors. I think they are perfect. They cut everything and I think the material will last for a century!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamRafael

customer_reviews.title: sharp!
customer_reviews.text: The weight and balance of the scissors is great on the hand. They cut smoothly through material.
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quality sewing scissors. These quality of product is hard to find
customer_reviews.author: tvchuckles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and solid. They fit your hand perfectly, and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp very nice scissors. They are incredibly sharp from base to tip, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea cumiford

customer_reviews.title: Big scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger and much heavier than I thought. GOOD: Sharp and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: NYtoNC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these for fabric sheers. a little heavy but they cut well. and they are solid
customer_reviews.author: Mmb

customer_reviews.title: Love Them.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality scissors. Sharp as a chainsaw. A little heavy but that's not an issue for me. You can tell the quality by the weight.
customer_reviews.author: bMan

customer_reviews.title: bigger but strong
customer_reviews.text: way bigger than i thought but it cuts through anything
customer_reviews.author: Ben C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, great price and feels good to the hand, 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Doug T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cut
customer_reviews.text: My brother who works with heavy upholstery and fabric loved these scissors! Excellent cut!
customer_reviews.author: blues

customer_reviews.title: NOT SHARP
customer_reviews.text: These are not sharp at all... they made a mess of my fabric right from the beginning and are just as bad if not worse than the cheap kitchen scissors i was using before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the scissors I've ever owned ever! And I've owned a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Stephan O. Bonaparte

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the word dressmaking in the title -- these are great all-around the house scissors at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut through material, but like them so much they have become my go-to scissors for almost everything. The long length helps cutting a straight line and you get more cut per squeeze. The hefty weight helps cut through things like cardboard boxes, which is also helped by the length. The sharpness make all snipping jobs a breeze around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scissors cuts cleanly and comfortably. It worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got these scissors a few months ago and have only been able to use them once. they arrives dull and I'm not sure if something need to be adjusted, but it doesn't cut right. great weight, good handle but I just received a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: This scissor cut like butter love it
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This scissor cut like butter love it, Cons:The scissor is really heavy which makes it hard to maneuver, wish they would make the handle more lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Akinom

customer_reviews.title: Worst scissors
customer_reviews.text: I am a technical fashion designer and working with fabrics for past 5 years I have not used such a worst scissors ever . It is too blunt and can't even take 2 layers of cotton. I am very unhappy and it is complete waste of money. I would recommend fiskar .
customer_reviews.author: Jishnu

customer_reviews.title: Love this heavy duty scissor for cutting fabric
customer_reviews.text: Love this heavy duty scissor for cutting fabric! It's a bit heavy for small hands but gives a perfect straight cut!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Ayello

customer_reviews.title: This scissor is reallly bad. It is very dull and it's not sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: This scissor is reallly bad. It is very dull and it's not sharp at all. Very disappointed and I will be returns it.
customer_reviews.author: kanneh tarawalli

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking scizzors but dulled up in less than a week.
